body: In any form, natural lycanthropes can communicate and empathize with animals related to their animal form. They can use Diplomacy to alter such an animal's attitude, and when so doing gain a +4 racial bonus on the check. Afflicted lycanthropes only gain this ability in animal or hybrid form.
name: Lycanthropic Empathy

sections.body: lycanthropic empathy (bears and dire bears); Location: Special Qualities.
